titleStmt.title: Certaine small poems lately printed with the tragedie of Philotas. Written by Samuel Daniel.
Selections
titleStmt.author: Daniel, Samuel, 1562-1619.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Eld for Simon Waterson [and Edward Blount],
